Uses of Class
com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.AbstractMonitorableFeature

  • Packages that use AbstractMonitorableFeature 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features
    Various features specific to the dependency parsing phase.

    • Uses of AbstractMonitorableFeature in com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features

      Subclasses of AbstractMonitorableFeature in com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddressFunctionBuffer
      Retrieves the nth item from the buffer.
      class  AddressFunctionDep
      Retrieves the nth dependent of the reference token.
      class  AddressFunctionHead
      Retrieves the head (or governor) of the reference token.
      class  AddressFunctionLDep
      Retrieves the left-most left-hand dependent of the reference token.
      class  AddressFunctionOffset
      Retrieves the token offset from the current token by n (in the linear sentence), where n can be negative (before the current token) or positive (after the current token).
      The "current token" is returned by the address function.
      class  AddressFunctionRDep
      Retrieves the right-most right-hand dependent of the reference token.
      class  AddressFunctionSequence
      Retrieves the nth pos-tagged token in the sequence of tokens.
      class  AddressFunctionStack
      Retrieves the nth item from the stack.
      class  AncestorSearchFeature
      Looks at all of the ancestors of a given reference token in sequence, and returns the first one matching certain criteria.
      class  BackwardSearchFeature
      Looks at all pos-tagged tokens preceding the reference token in sequence (starting at the one closest to the reference token), and returns the first one matching certain criteria.
      class  BetweenCountIf
      Returns the number of pos-tagged tokens between two pos-tagged tokens (and not including them) matching a certain criterion.
      class  DependencyCountIf
      Returns the number of dependents already matching a certain criterion.
      class  DependencyLabelFeature
      The dependency label of a given token's governing dependency, where the token is referenced by address.
      class  DependencySearchFeature
      Looks at all of the refernence token's dependencies in left-to-right sequence, and returns the first one matching certain criteria.
      class  DistanceFeature
      Returns the distance between the token referred to by addressFunction1 and the token referred to by addressFunction2, as an absolute value from 0 to n.
      class  ForwardSearchFeature
      Looks at all pos-tagged tokens following the reference token in sequence, and returns the first one matching certain criteria.
      class  StackSearchFeature
      Looks at all items on the stack above a certain index, and returns the first one meeting a criterion.
      class  TokenSearchFeature
      Returns the first token in a given range which matches a certain criterion, or null if no such token is found.
      If a start index is provided as a second argument, will start looking at this index.
      If an end index is provided as a third argument, will continue until the end index.
      All indexes must be <= the current history size, otherwise only valid indexes will be looked at.
      If start index >= end index, will look backwards, otherwise will look forwards.
      A stopCriterion can be provided, in which case the search will stop as soon as the stop criterion is hit.
      class  ValencyByLabelFeature
      Returns the number of dependents for a given head and label.
      class  ValencyFeature
      Returns the number of dependents.
